item.title: There's no place at Imperial for elitist 'secret' clubs
item.author: Felix Editor,Andrew D Olson Gallardo,
item.description: Everyone studying at Imperial is aware that this place is not perfect. Yes, there are problems with student engagement, mental health, even sexism. But despite these issues, I feel it is the place which has mainly contributed at making me who I am today; the fantastic wardening team in my halls in â€¦
